page_content:
Steria Limited

Steria Platform on Command (POC)

Platform on Command a PaaS offering which provides an available, flexible, reliable and secure monitored and managed platform to host your own applications. Providing Windows, RHEL and open source Linux O/S, four service level options and configurable storage and back-up, this service can be tailored to meet business needs.

Features

  • Monitored and Managed 24 x 7 by security cleared staff
  • Windows, RHEL and open source Linux options available
  • Multiple Service levels and VM sizes
  • Dev/test managed service option charged by the hour
  • Configurable Storage and back-up, disaster recovery options available
  • Provides High availability and fault tolerance
  • Connectivity via the internet, PSN, N3 or private leased line
  • Use as part of your Business Continuity arrangements
  • Standard, repeatable on-boarding and off-boarding processes
  • UK Sovereign cloud platform delivered from two UK data centres

Benefits

  • Monitored and managed service 24 x 7
  • Flex up and down as business needs change
  • Responsive – rapid provisioning and configuration (VM, back-up, storage, network)
  • Value for money – pay for use
  • Flexible hourly Dev and Test provisioning to meet Agile requirements
  • Support add-ons for applications from e.g. Pegasystems and Alfresco
  • Low risk - Trusted service from an experienced services provider
  • Reliable - Industry standard virtualisation components used to ensure availability
  • Disaster tolerant – hosted in 2 UK DC 100km apart
  • Green – market leading efficiency around power and cooling

Pricing

£192.78 per virtual machine per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Other
